name: Joidô
description:
This game is destinated for those interested in solving challenging puzzles. 

The puzzles of this game are made by correctly drawing patterns that resemble password patterns to unlock today's smartphones, but they are much more challenging and elegants. The possibilities are practicaly infinite. 

The main game has a total of 90 levels that increase in difficult as the player moves on. At the end of the 90 levels, the player will be able to see the final results, where the game show statistics of overall performance compared to other players. 

The game has also other features, such as:
1. Players can draw patterns themselves by exploring their creativity to create challenging patterns;
2. Load some of their friends patterns; and 
3. Solve daily challenges (that also shows statistics) that are constantly updated.
